  • Nagarjuna and Difference
  • Illuminated Manuscripts

From the exhibition Memories of the Future, curated by Katherine Dennis and Noa Bronstein. A group of images and artefacts staged in the Gibson House Museum, Toronto. The images were produced from scanned photos of the Gibson family selected by the Museum’s curator. The artefacts were selected from the Collection at the Orillia Museum of Art & History. The artefacts titles are from Canadian Living’s Top 15 Home Staging Tips (Installation photos by Toni Hafkenscheid)

Download Catalogue (PDF: 12.8 MB)

  • Date of creation: 2014
  • Measurements: 5.5 x 5in
  • Medium: Inkjet print
